name: Fidenz Technologies
tagline: Native iOS and Android Apps with RoR Backends
description:
Fidenz is a software development services company with the specialty in the native mobile apps and Ruby on Rails backends. 
Colombo (Sri Lanka) based development services company was founded in 2010 and provide services to clients from many parts of the world including countries like United State, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia and Singapore. 
Fidenz have adopted their development process from Agile and uses JIRA, Slack, Basecamp and GitHub to manage and deliver projects in collaboration with clients while maintaining great transparency. 
Engagement with Fidenz could be two fold, either as a fixed cost, fixed time projects or as dedicated resources to expand capacity of existing development teams. 
In-house designers, testers and project managers along with developers have the ability to provide end to end solutions adapted from emerging trends in the industry.
